front: This pet loves to purr and has whiskers, who am I?
I'm a loyal friend that wags its tail, who am I?
I can hop and my ears are big, can you guess me?
I chirp and sing, living in a cage, who could I be?
I'm slow and carry a house on my back, who am I?
I swim around in a bowl, with fins and gills, can you guess?
I squeak and love my wheel, who am I?
This pet hisses but is friendly, with scales, who am I?
I come in a shell and love to crawl, can you guess what I am?
With fluffy fur and tiny paws, I jump and squeak, who am I?
